snippet: The company, Fresenius Medical Care, may have failed to tell customers that one of its products was connected to a potentially lethal risk.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration is investigating whether Fresenius Medical Care, the nation's largest operator of dialysis centers, violated federal regulations by failing to inform customers of a potentially lethal risk connected to one of its products.
lead_paragraph: The company, Fresenius Medical Care, may have failed to tell customers that one of its products was connected to a potentially lethal risk.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Investigates Fresenius for Failure to Warn of Risk
headline.main: Dialysis Company’s Failure to Warn of Product Risk Draws Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Dialysis Company’s Failure to Warn of Product Risk Draws F.D.A. Inquiry

keywords.value: Fresenius Medical Care AG & Company KGaA
keywords.name: organizations
